name: Seamless Shield
description:
Provides 1 Shield, protecting your active character.
When this effect is removed, or generated again: Deal 1 Dendro DMG, and heal your active character for 1 HP.
descriptionraw: Provides <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K6]</color>, protecting your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this effect is removed, or generated again:</color> Deal 1 $[K107], and heal your active character for 1 HP.
descriptionreplaced: Provides <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color></color>, protecting your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this effect is removed, or generated again:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>, and heal your active character for 1 HP.
